data.text: -We have to talk about this. "Rocketman."

data.text: You're in the new -- It's the Elton John biopic.

data.text: I'm a big fan of Elton John.

data.text: -You're such a baby. -I was very young.

data.text: -Oh, my God.

translation.text: -Ôi chúa ơi.

data.text: -I may look very old, but I'm actually much younger.

data.text: -No, absolutely, wow. -So, yeah.

data.text: And now I've kind of immersed in all of his music, which I love.

data.text: -Yeah. Do you have a favorite?

translation.text: -Yeah. Bạn có yêu thích?

data.text: is up there as one of my top favorites.

translation.text: như năm tháng trôi qua

data.text: Blink, bang, bah, bah, blunk.

translation.text: Nháy mắt, bang, bah, bah, blunk.

data.text: Yeah, it's so good.

translation.text: Vâng, nó rất tốt.

data.text: -Yeah, it's good.

translation.text: -Yeah, nó tốt.

data.text: -Did you get to meet him at all?

data.text: He's really, really nice. -It's a beautiful movie.

data.text: It's all kind of love and joy and compassion, just like him.

data.text: -No.
